TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {28579=May 28, 1989: Traded by the Milwaukee Bucks (as a future 1990 2nd round draft pick) with Terry Cummings to the San Antonio Spurs for Greg Anderson, Alvin Robertson and a 1989 2nd round draft pick (Frank Kornet was later selected)., 29742=January 7, 1992: Waived by the Charlotte Hornets., 29553=December 11, 1991: Signed as a free agent with the Charlotte Hornets., 31476=September 10, 1996: Signed as a free agent with the New Jersey Nets., 30515=June 24, 1995: Drafted by the Toronto Raptors from the Los Angeles Clippers in the NBA expansion draft., 29381=November 2, 1991: Waived by the San Antonio Spurs., 34432=August 22, 2003: Signed as a free agent with the Sacramento Kings., 34618=August 4, 2004: Signed as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs., 29162=June 27, 1990: Drafted by the San Antonio Spurs in the 2nd round (43rd pick) of the 1990 NBA Draft., 30116=February 13, 1992: Signed the first of two 10-day contracts with the Golden State Warriors., 34251=December 15, 2002: Signed as a free agent with the Utah Jazz., 32259=August 27, 1999: As part of a 3-team trade, traded by the Vancouver Grizzlies with Steve Francis to the Houston Rockets; the Houston Rockets traded Antoine Carr, Michael Dickerson, Othella Harrington, Brent Price and a 2003 1st round draft pick (Marcus Banks was later selected) to the Vancouver Grizzlies; the Orlando Magic traded Don MacLean and a 2001 1st round draft pick (Jason Collins was later selected) to the Houston Rockets; the Orlando Magic traded a 2002 2nd round draft pick (Matt Barnes was later selected) to the Vancouver Grizzlies; and the Vancouver Grizzlies traded Lee Mayberry, Makhtar N'Diaye, Rodrick Rhodes and Michael Smith to the Orlando Magic., 29913=January 10, 1992: Signed the first of two 10-day contracts with the Boston Celtics., 31664=July 28, 1997: Signed as a free agent with the Boston Celtics., 30766=February 22, 1996: Traded by the Toronto Raptors with Ed Pinckney, a 1996 2nd round draft pick (Ryan Minor was later selected) and a 1997 2nd round draft pick (James Collins was later selected) to the Philadelphia 76ers for Sharone Wright. Philadelphia had the option to swap 1st round draft picks with Toronto in either 1996 or 1997 but did not do so; Philadelphia received a 2nd round draft pick in 1997 instead., 30327=June 27, 1994: Signed as a free agent with the Los Angeles Clippers., 34063=August 3, 2000: Signed as a free agent with the Vancouver Grizzlies., 27750=Championships (Minimum 1 playoff game) 2005 San Antonio Spurs (NBA), 31846=October 28, 1997: Traded by the Boston Celtics with a 1999 2nd round draft pick (Obinna Ekezie was later selected) to the Vancouver Grizzlies for Roy Rogers.}
textBeforeTable: Salaries August 4, 2004: Signed as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs. August 22, 2003: Signed as a free agent with the Sacramento Kings. December 15, 2002: Signed as a free agent with the Utah Jazz. August 3, 2000: Signed as a free agent with the Vancouver Grizzlies. August 27, 1999: As part of a 3-team trade, traded by the Vancouver Grizzlies with Steve Francis to the Houston Rockets; the Houston Rockets traded Antoine Carr, Michael Dickerson, Othella Harrington, Brent Price and a 2003 1st round draft pick (Marcus Banks was later selected) to the Vancouver Grizzlies; the Orlando Magic traded Don MacLean and a 2001 1st round draft pick (Jason Collins was later selected) to the Houston Rockets; the Orlando Magic traded a 2002 2nd round draft pick (Matt Barnes was later selected) to the Vancouver Grizzlies; and the Vancouver Grizzlies traded Lee Mayberry, Makhtar N'Diaye, Rodrick Rhodes and Michael Smith to the Orlando Magic.
